Description: Serpentine kohl-pot of typical form, made in two parts, rim plus body, containing traces of cosmetic.
Curator's comments: Published: Les amour d'une princesse égyptienne, Saint-Gérard 1997, p.122 [88].
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1997 May-Oct, Abbaye Saint-Gerard De Brogne, Le Roman de la momie
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Mrs Marion Whiteford Acworth JP
